mapper.insert:
select seq_board_no.nextval FROM dual
insert into board_tbl(boardNo,boardTitle,boardContent,boardRegDate) values(#{boardNo},#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},sysdate)
mapper.select: select boardNo,boardTitle,boardContent,to_char(boardRegDate,'yyyy/mm/dd') boardRegDate from board_tbl order by boardRegDate desc
